ResearchProjectDef.label: Anneli Nutrient Solution
ResearchProjectDef.description: More efficient and nastier than nutrient paste meals. Annelitrices won't mind it at all, as they grow up in it.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Anneli Growth Factor Cocktails
ResearchProjectDef.description: A drug made of mysterious technology. Can only revive Annelitrices.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Anneli Incubator
ResearchProjectDef.description: A structure to house Annelitrice worms. Need nutrient solution as fuel to feed the worms, so that they can produce Evolution Points./n"Why are we spending such efforts and resources for these slimy worms while our own people are still living in barracks?"/n"Shush! Just keep your mouth shut for your own good. They are very sensitive creatures."

ResearchProjectDef.label: Anneli Puppet Theatre
ResearchProjectDef.description: Puppetry is a form of theatre or performance that involves the manipulation of puppets. It basically works as a TV for medieval society. Additionally, it gives your colonists an opportunity to reproduce the plots and costumes of some famous works by an unknown movie producer.
